imdb.plot outline: It has been a hundred years from the first group that started with a one-way trip to Mars, to landing and surviving on a new barren planet. By 2118, large colonies of humans separated by their nation's alliances but funded by private companies have been living on and mining Mars resources for over 50 years. Kirill Meretskov a disgraced ex-Russian federation officer who stood against his own to save innocents in Norway during the 2107 North Atlantic war now a former convict finds the only hope for a new life for his family is taking a job on Mars. What happens next when he reaches Mars will not only change his life and family's life but the course of human history.
imdb.title: Crimson Hope
